description: Automatically like posts of people you're close to

sessionCookieCUser.label: Session cookie c_user (?)
sessionCookieCUser.placeholder: Paste your c_user session cookie here

sessionCookieXs.label: Session cookie xs (?)
sessionCookieXs.placeholder: Paste your xs session cookie here

spreadsheetUrl.label: Spreadsheet URL or a Facebook profile URL (?)
spreadsheetUrl.helper: Enter either a Google Spreadsheet URL or a CSV URL (make sure your file is publicly available) or a Facebook profile

columnName.label: Column name from which Twitter profile URLs
columnName.helper: By default, we'll use the first column of your spreadsheet (column A)

likesCountPerProfile.label: Number of likes to send per profile per launch (?)
likesCountPerProfile.helper: By default the API will like 1 post per profile per launch

postLimit.label: Number of posts to load per profile (?)
postLimit.helper: By default the API will only load the last 10 posts

numberOfProfilesPerLaunch.label: Number of profiles to process per launch (?)
numberOfProfilesPerLaunch.helper: If using a spreadsheet. By default the API will open 10 profiles per launch
